data.author: WRansohoff

changelog.release_notes:
v1.3:

- Merged in changes by kamotswolf adding an option to toggle drop shadows, if you'd rather play without them.

v1.2:

Bug fixes:
- Loading now restores the correct position AND rotation.
- Fixed restarting after a loss; previously it would start a new game behind the title screen.

Features:
- Added high score.

V1.1:

Bug fixes:
- Rotating a square block no longer causes a crash.
- Loading a game where the current block is square no longer causes a crash.
- Loading now correctly positions the last block.
- The 'level' number no longer needs a line clear to refresh after loading.

Features:
- Long-pressing up/down will now snap the block as far left/right as it can go.
V1 - mostly feature complete. The only thing I can think to add is high scores, but suggestions and bug reports are welcome.

data.description:
Tetris for the Pebble Time! I loved the original Pebble's Tetris app, so I decided to make one in color for the Pebble Time.

Controls:
Back: Pause / Quit. Progress is saved automatically when you quit from within a game.
Up: Move block left.
Down: Move block right.
Select: Rotate block / Resume.
Up (hold): Snap block left.
Down (hold): Snap block right.
Select (hold): Quick drop.

This project is open source under the MIT license! I think that I've tested it well, but I wrote it quickly in my free time so please report any bugs you run into.

Github: https://github.com/WRansohoff/Tetris-PebbleTime

Credits:
Thanks to kamotswolf for adding an option to toggle the drop shadows.

latest_release.release_notes:
